messages.content: Hello, thanks for choosing Healthcaremagic. I have reviewed your query and would be happy to assist you. Kindly upload the pictures of your son so that I can guide you accordingly. Hope this answers your question. Let me know if I can assist you further.
i should improve model by prompt engineering

Hi, Prompt engineering is the most important part of LLMs. You can train your model by following below steps:
1.  Dataset Preparation and Cleaning: Prepare a dataset with prompts and corresponding responses from human experts or previous models. Clean this data to eliminate noise, inconsistencies, and irrelevant information.
2.  Prompt Engineering Techniques: Experiment with various prompt engineering techniques like chain-of-thought prompting, few-shot learning, and using templates to guide the model's reasoning process.
3.  Fine-tuning: Train your model on a smaller dataset of prompts and responses from human experts or previous models in order to improve its ability to follow instructions.
how can i reduce my body heat

Hi,If you are experiencing body heat and sweating, it is a sign of fever. If you have any other symptoms like headache or muscle pain, it could be a viral infection that causes flu. It will improve with the help of fluids. You can take paracetamol to reduce your body temperature. Take plenty of fluids such as water, juice, etc. Drink warm water for better results. Hope this answers your question. Let me know if I can assist you further.
